lines.gurmukhi: pr iqRA dIrG smwin lGu jwvdyk; jnnI BgnI suqw rUp kY inhwrIAY [

Unknown.translation: So far as other women are concerned, regard elder to you as mother; one of your age as sister and younger than yourself as your daughter.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: vfI bRobrI dI CotI ijQoˆ qk BI Xw ijqnI mwqR BI koeI prweI iesqRI AwKI jw skdI hY, Es vfI nUM mwqw bRobr dI nUM BYx, CotI nUM DI rUp kr ky qkIey[

lines.gurmukhi: pr drbwsih gaU mws quil jwin irdY; kIjY n sprsu Aprs isDwrIAY [

Unknown.translation: Let the desire for other's wealth be treated like beef that is not to be touched, and remain away from it.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: sih swQ hI vwsih iek`Ty kIqy sB Bwˆq dy smUlcy hI pr drbw prwey Dn mn AMdr gaU dy mws bRobr AB`K rUp hrwm jwn ky ienwˆ nUM sprS nw kry Cohy nw ieQoˆ qk ik eynwˆ pwsoˆ dI BI Aprs ibnwˆ CoihAwˆ isDwrIey lMG hI jweIey Bwv q`kx leI BI nw EQy KVy hoeIey[

lines.gurmukhi: Git Git pUrn bRhm joiq Eiq poiq; Avgunu gun kwhU ko n bIcwrIAY [

Unknown.translation: Consider the radiance of complete Lord residing in every body like warp and weft and dwell not on anybody's merits and demerits.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: Git Git smUh srIrwˆ vw AMqwkrxwˆ AMdr qwxy pyty vq prmwqmw dI joq pRIpUrx rmI hoeI jwx ky, iksy dy BI AOguxwˆ guxwˆ nUM Awpxy ic`q ivc nw icqwrIey[

lines.gurmukhi: gur aupdys mn Dwvq brij; pr Dn pr qn pr dUK n invwrIAY [547[

Unknown.translation: By virtue of True Guru's sermon, keep the wandering of the mind in ten directions under control and abstain it from looking at other's woman, other's wealth and slander.  (547)

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: qwqpRX kIh ik guraupdyS nUM ihrdy AMdr Dwr ky Dwvq dOVdy hoey Btkdy mn nUM rokidAwˆ rokidAwˆ, prwey Dn, prwey qn qy prweI dUKnw vloˆ Awp nUM inivrq kr htw leIey ]547]
